Projects | Samnang Nuonsinoeun
Hardware Development

MicroBot - Two Wheel RC Robot

MicroBot is a two-wheel differential drive robot that is controlled by the built-in accelerometer on the Micro:bit.
Entrepreneurship

KlemBox - Experiential learning provider

The first affordable and innovative experiential learning provider, aligned with the national curriculum, in Cambodia.
Software Development

Morfli

A digital "textbook" for introductory materials science that uses computational models to explore materials phenomena.
Mechanical Design

The Mistband - wrist cuff door opener

The Mistband is an unobtrusive device consisting of a wrist cuff and a loop that independently and safely opens doors.
Mechanical Design

Clip-it Belt - Retractable Wheelchair seatbelt

Wheelchair seatbelt that enables users with hand and trunk mobility limitations to fasten their seatbelt independently and securely, promoting ease of use and a sense of autonomy.
